item.description:
Lecture times at the Stratford Halloween Festival can be changed by SGRA.

Lecture times:

4:00 or 4:30 Dr. Andrew Neblett

www.neblettonline.com

4:30 give or take a half hour start time
Welcome
Introduction to SGRA
This lecture was 90 minutes a few weeks ago in Trumbull Library, so
I do not know what will be left out at this Event.

5:00 Amy Blackmarr, Author of
Dahlonega Haunts: Ghostly Adventures in a
Georgia Mountain Town

www.amyblackmarr.com

6:00 Hefferey Keene; Past, Lives & Reincarnation

7:00 Real Hauntings; Fact or Fiction

Connecticut Post Article
From Last Sunday

Walking tour tracks haunted Stratford

www.connpost.com/localnews/ci_7237828

Wiccan Vendor

www.thecircleofthesacredwell.org

2:30 Meet Up time
And Location before going to The
Perry House

Harborside Bar & Grill
946 Ferry Blvd
Stratford, Ct. 06614
Across Street from Dock Shopping Center.

Since Alexandra has indicated that she will be coming in around
3:00, I pushed Harborside up by a half hour to 2:30.
I might even get there a little earlier. I want to get a bite to
Eat at Harborside before meeting with Alexandra.

From I 95 Nth take Exit 33 Ferry Blvd,
Merge onto Ferry Blvd.
Turn Right at 3rd light.

I 95 Sth take Exit 34 towards Milford.
Turn right onto Bridgeport Ave. (Rte 1).
Continue over the Devon Bridge.
Turn Left at Light.

www.harborsidebargrill.com/

From Harborside to The Perry House.

Head NE on Ferry Blvd/ Rte 1 toward Rivercliff Dr.
Stay on Rte 1 E.
Turn right at Rivercliff Dr.
Make a U Turn at Housatonic Dr.
Turn left at Bridgeport Ave, Rte 1.
Stay on Rte 1
Slight right at Barnum Ave Cutoff/Rte 1 W
Turn left at CT 113 Main St.
Turn right at W Broad St.

2007 Stratford Halloween Festival is set to take place from Friday, Oct 26
through Sunday, Oct 28, From 4 to 8 in Stratford, Ct.

www.sgra-media.org/halloweenfestival/


The Perry House
1128 W Broad St
Stratford, CT 06615
(203) 377-3779

The entrance to The Perry House is next to a Traffic
Circle, so be careful as you are making the right hand
Turn into the Parking Lot.
The Perry House is right next to the Stratford Senior Center.

I 95 N Exit 32 to merge onto W Broad St.
At traffic circle, take 1st Exit & stay on W Broad St.
Make a U Turn at Main St.

I 95S Exit 32 toward W Broad St
Turn right at Linden Ave
Turn right at Church St
Turn right at Main St
Turn right at W Broad St.

Halloween Festival will feature presentations on paranormal phenomena,
vendors and information area, crafts for kids, family activities,
classic Halloween movies & much more.
One Room will have Psychic Readings.
One Room will have Lectures and Video.
At least One Room will have Vendors.

There will be a Ghost Tour around the mile circumference of the 1690 Perry House going out every hour.
At this time the 7 pm Tour is full.


www.sgra-media.org


Festivals program will also provide a look at where Halloween & everything that we
Know about it today came from.

I will be leaving around 8:00 pm or so because I am going to a Halloween
Meet Up with Christine Group.

On Friday night, Oct 26 I will be making RSVP Changes and then
Close the RSVP.

I will make changes to the Sunday Meet Up when I get home on
Saturday night.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Stratford Halloween Festival - Saturday 10/27
